Summary: Two witnesses saw small objects one moving strangely.
divs: Sighting Details Standing in front of house. Saw airplane to the north leaving contrail. Turned around and looked to the south. Saw small bright object moving east to west in a straight line It did not lerve a contrail The object then stoped and remained stationary. I called my son in law to come out and look at it. I showed him wher to look and he saw it also. The object was still in the same place but now it was moving side to side and in circles. Another object appeared moving south to north. Much larger, moving in a straight line. It appeared to be moving very fast. I looked back at the first object and it was still there. When I looked back to the second object it was gone. The first object then resumed moving wes and was soon gone. My son in law went back into the house. About five minutes later I saw another object to the south east. It moved behind some thin white clouds ,but I could still see it. The object then faded and was gone. Neither I or my son in law had ever seen anything like it.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Industry
There were 3 other sightings in Industry on or around May 22nd 2012
